thread.title: Roommate turns house into a passive-aggressive “art gallery” (12 Photos)
thread.title_full: Roommate turns house into a passive-aggressive “art gallery” (12 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: Roommate turns house into a passive-aggressive “art gallery” (12 Photos)
text:
“Sour cream covered spoon, left in sink before leaving town for four days.” 5 
“Knife left out on counter in striking distance of knife block, having been only used to remove seal of ice cream carton, which was also left on counter, leaving quite the sight as the last thing I saw before I gratefully left town for two weeks. Advertisement Advertisement 6 
“Boxes left on couch because what even is breaking them down and recycling or even not leaving them not on the couch.” 7 
“Shoes on shoe rack (nearly).” 8 
Critics tweeted their praise for his collection and even asked for evaluations of their own “artwork.” 
I would have to say I’m really drawn to the sour cream spoon. Hopefully this funny jab with be enough to give his roommate a kick in the ass and clean up his stuff. Bravo Justin, thanks giving us something that all roommates can relate to. 9
